鏽紅腹旋木雀.pinyin: xiu4 hong2 fu4 xuan2 mu4 que4
鏽紅腹旋木雀.definition: (bird species of China) rusty-flanked treecreeper (Certhia nipalensis)

鏽胸藍姬鶲.definition: (bird species of China) slaty-backed flycatcher (Ficedula erithacus)

鏽腹短翅鶇.definition: (bird species of China) rusty-bellied shortwing (Brachypteryx hyperythra)

鏽臉鉤嘴鶥.definition: (bird species of China) rusty-cheeked scimitar babbler (Erythrogenys erythrogenys)

鏽額斑翅鶥.definition: (bird species of China) rusty-fronted barwing (Actinodura egertoni)
